txt.en: 'The Cape of Belfalas is under rule of Dol Amroth and it has been this way since I can remember. Not that I have been to the city in many a long year. Ha, that is how it goes sometimes, I reckon!\n\n'Some prefer the view from this rock or that hill, but in truth there is hardly a spot to stand in the Cape of Belfalas that does not show a lovely sight! You should explore and see it for yourself. I know you will enjoy every moment! Be sure to visit the stage, the docks, and either of the islands!'
Falastír is located at the lighthouse on the Cape of Belfalas.\n\nYou should let Falastír know that you have toured the Cape as he suggested.
The Cape of Belfalas
This is certainly the largest house you have seen in quite some time
The old man is happy to know you have seen the sights
'So, my new friend, what do you think of the Cape of Belfalas? Is it not the most relaxing place in all of Gondor - nay, of Middle-earth?'
Falastír wants you to see the sites of the Cape of Belfalas.
The sounds and sights of the shore are refreshing
Visit the Court of Anglind
Visit the Cathlond, the cape docks
Visit one of the smaller houses on the Cape
The view of Tolfalas is impressive
Visit the interior of Narvindon
Visit one of the standard sized houses on the Cape
You admire the craftsmanship of the lighthouse
Visit one of the largest houses on the Cape
Take a boat to one of the islands off the coast
This house is most impressive
Falastír, the friendly lighthouse keeper of the Cape of Belfalas, has agreed to show you around the coast.
Nothing better than being so close to the water
The house is stately and large
Talk to Falastír
